text: José Maria Marcos or simply Marcos (born 12 June 1970 in São Paulo) is a former Brazilian football player. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:FC KAMAZ Naberezhnye Chelny players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Ceará Sporting Club players Category:Association football midfielders
title: José Maria Marcos
